ComicInfo.Summary:
Timmy battles Pitt in the mindscape Pitt refuses to fight back as Timmy beats on him. During the fight Zoyvod appears telling Timmy that Pitt is his twin brother this revelation snaps Timmy out of his rage as he and Pitt return to the real world. Grandpa takes Timmy home as the school boys continue to tease him the boys are seemingly abducted by a strange man later. Pitt returns to the woods only to find himself under attack by Quagg.
This is the first Pitt comic put out solely by Full Bleed Studios.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-27 18:57:28. [Issue ID 41976]
